WorkItem.Description:
The label in the options menu to turn off automatic updates is kind of misleading. It says"disable automatic updates". Per a facebook thread on the Fishbowl group I learned that this also (http://www.facebook.com/topic.php?uid=148573025964&topic=14468) it not only turns off auto updates but acutally turns up all update checking. 
 
 
This option should be reworded or preferably made two seperate options.
